I’ve spent my whole life working for the people. I took on Wall Street banks and won $20B for California homeowners, and prosecuted transnational gangs. We need a President who serves the public interest — not self-interest.

Last year as a result of GOP leadership Americans across the country saw a booming economy & higher wages. I reintroduced my bill as I believe that making the historic tax cuts permanent is a step forward for Congress to deliver on our promises made to the American people.

Amazon made $10,835,000,000 last year. Its effective federal tax rate was -1%. 

Delta made $5,073,000,000. Its effective tax rate was -4%. 

Our rigged tax code has essentially legalized tax dodging for large corporations.
